review.title: “Flexible”
review.pros: Pros – The company is very flexible in terms of being able to take time off or go to appointments during the day. It is easy to talk to the owners since they are very involved in running the business.
review.cons: Cons – As it is a small company you don't have the ability to move around to different positions or get promoted unless someone else leaves.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
